events.title: e-Yantra Innovation Challenge
events.description: A unique robotics competition where participants “learn while they compete and compete while they learn.” The competition is a “hardware MOOC (Massive Online Open Course) available internationally.

events.title: TATA Imagination Challenge
events.description: India’s largest ideas fest is back and you stand a chance to win ₹2 lakh! #TataImaginationChallenge 2022 is open to all college students across India and Tata employees worldwide. Registration ends by 15 Sept, 2022.

events.description: Survey and literature Review in IEEE format with mentor

events.title: Ideathon Competition
events.description: Top 20-25 ideas will be shortlisted for the next level of Proof of Concept (PoC) competition

events.title: APP@THON
events.description: Ready? Steady? Solve, use your skills to solve real world problems
